title: The Seibels Bruce Group, Inc. Appoints Adrian E. Brown Chief Risk Officer
text:
The Seibels Bruce Group, Inc. Appoints Adrian E. Brown Chief Risk Officer [September 02, 2015] Tweet 
The Seibels Bruce Group, Inc., (Seibels), an insurance services provider of business process outsourcing solutions, is pleased to announce the appointment of Adrian E. Brown to Chief Risk Officer. Mr. Brown will be responsible for coordinating enterprise risk management strategies for Seibels in the areas of disaster recovery, data retention, and corporate risk identification. 
Prior to joining Seibels, Mr. Brown served as a property and casualty insurance technology consultant after serving as CIO of Canal Insurance Company in Greenville, South Carolina. Mr. Brown earned his Master of Science in Information Technology from The George Washington University, and has thirty years of property and casualty experience in IT as well as a strong background in the financial industry. 
"We are excited to welcome Adrian Brown to Seibels as Chief Risk Officer," said Rex W. Huggins, Chairman and CEO of Seibels. "As CRO, Adrian will focus on improving the integrity of our systems' network, infrastructure, and ITO operations while also serving as a mentor to our data warehouse team. Adrian has a deep understanding of the P&C insurance technology industry, and we feel confident that his expertise and leadership will help refine Seibels' business processes and efficiencies, particularly as we continue to grow our market share and expand our service offerings." 
About Seibels 
Seibels provides a suite of business process outsourcing solutions to the property and casualty insurance industry, including policy administration, claims administration, technology and accounting and reporting services.From its start as a fire and life insurance company in 1869, Seibels has evolved and prospered over the past 145+ years. By leveraging a strong combination of insurance industry and technology expertise, Seibels helps today's property and casualty insurers achieve operational efficiency. Seibels recognizes the value of quality customer service, strong client relations, continuous innovation and integrity. For more information, please visit www.seibels.com .
